Types of sacrifice [an4.39:6.6]: The kind of sacrifice where cattle, goats and sheep, chickens and pigs, and various kinds of creatures are slaughtered
The kind of sacrifice where cattle, goats and sheep, chickens and pigs, and various kinds of creatures are not slaughtered
The Buddha criticizes the kind of violent sacrifice where animals are slaughtered
The Buddha praises the kind of non-violent sacrifice where animals are not slaughtered
The attendance of great sages of good co: The great sages of good conduct don’t attend violent sacrifices where animals are killed
The great sages of good conduct do attend non-violent sacrifices of regular family tradition where animals aren’t killed
The benefits of non-violent sacrifices (: Such a sacrifice is very fruitful
For a sponsor of sacrifices like this, things get better, not worse
Such a sacrifice is truly abundant
